typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SouthridgeCustomers
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SouthridgeAddresses
source(output(
		{B09477DC-5DCD-412A-AC13-01606E390264} as string,
		Kolos as string,
		Orsos as string,
		{268 Tenth Ave} as string,
		NULL as string,
		Washington as string,
		DC as string,
		{21001} as string,
		{5555550561} as string,
		{2017-01-01} as string,
		{2017-07-16} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> FourthCoffeeCustomers
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> VanArsdelCustomers
SouthridgeCustomers derive(SourceSystemID = toString('CloudSales'),
		SourceSystemCustomerID = CustomerID) ~> DerivedColumn1
SouthridgeAddresses derive(SourceSystemID = toString('CloudSales'),
		SourceSystemCustomerID = CustomerID) ~> DerivedColumn2
FourthCoffeeCustomers derive(column1 = ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> DerivedColumn3
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
DerivedColumn2 sink(input(
		OrderDetailID as string,
		OrderID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		Quantity as string,
		UnitCost as string,
		LineNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
DerivedColumn3 sink(input(
		{B09477DC-5DCD-412A-AC13-01606E390264} as string,
		Kolos as string,
		Orsos as string,
		{268 Tenth Ave} as string,
		NULL as string,
		Washington as string,
		DC as string,
		{21001} as string,
		{5555550561} as string,
		{2017-01-01} as string,
		{2017-07-16} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink3
VanArsdelCustomers sink(input(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink4
